senses.sense_definition: Opposing the practice of severe self-discipline and the avoidance of all forms of indulgence.

examples.text: The philosopher presented several <w>antiascetic</w> arguments that encouraged people to enjoy life's simple pleasures.
Her <w>antiascetic</w> views were a direct reaction to the strict and joyless environment in which she was raised.

senses.sense_definition: A person who opposes the practice of severe self-discipline and the avoidance of pleasure.

examples.text: As a committed <w>antiascetic</w>, he believed that denying oneself happiness was unnecessary and harmful.
The author described himself as an <w>antiascetic</w> who celebrated the richness of human experience.
